NomaiObject: Excavation Site 1 PHLOX: Friends, a tentacled organism has become beached on the shore! I have tried to offer aid, but its painful shocks deter me! I request urgent assistance in aiding it before it perishes! 2 1 DAZ: Be cautious, Phlox! Give me a moment: I shall voyage there using a voyager stone, and use my voyager to safely guide it back into the waves! 3 2 PHLOX: Daz, that was incredible! Your vessel of alloy was not phased in the slightest by the organism's terrific bioelectricity! 4 2 PHLOX: Are there any limits at all to what the voyager is impervious to? 5 4 DAZ: Other than large bodies of water and hard impacts, the voyager is able to weather almost any hazard it is exposed to! I have faith it will someday allow us to work from the safety of our homes remotely. 6 5 PHLOX: I should have known this project was a long scheme to convince Cassava to move back to the Hanging City with you, Daz! Workshop EX2 5
